Package dev.morphia.query.filters

Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.morphia.query.filters.Filter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeoIntersectsFilter, GeoWithinFilter, LogicalFilter, NearFilter, RegexFilter, TextSearchFilter

extends Object
